overall its an enjoyable game while it might not be quite as deep as the xcom games it makes a lot of worthwhile improvements to the formula using your actions in any order you want multiple overwatch shots per action point remaining pretty deep skill tree and more it also does a good job organically incentivising aggressive tactics with the executions its worth playing if you like tactics games and either have or dont mind making an xbox account

great turnbased strategy game  the reviews gave me doubts but im glad i ended up buying on sale  if you loved xcom then youre almost guaranteed to enjoy this  my main complaints are the lack of mission variety and i wish that the campaign was longer but i still think youll get your moneys worth on sale  i also wish there was more weapon variety as its only your base weapons that you can upgrade with attachments  overall i enjoyed what i played
